data.title: Broken Angels — Dayton Metro Library
data.meta_description: Broken Angels — Morgan, Richard K., 1965- — Serving as a mercenary in a distasteful war, Takeshi Kovacs joins a covert team that aims to secure a coveted archeological prize, an endeavor that ensnares him in a web of treachery and betrayal.
data.text:
Serving as a mercenary in a distasteful war, Takeshi Kovacs joins a covert team that aims to secure a coveted archeological prize, an endeavor that ensnares him in a web of treachery and betrayal.

There are no comments from the community on this title
